carbon.name: Coal
carbon.description: Dark basic mineral. Perfect for beginners.

cobre.name: Copper
cobre.description: Malleable reddish metal. Easy to work with.

hierro.name: Iron
hierro.description: Durable gray metal. Excellent for tools.

plata.name: Silver
plata.description: Precious shiny metal. Highly valuable on market.

tungsteno.name: Tungsten
tungsteno.description: Resistant high-hardness metal. Rare and valuable.

oro.name: Gold
oro.description: Precious yellow metal. Extremely rare and expensive.

obsidiana.name: Obsidian
obsidiana.description: Black volcanic glass. Very sharp when broken.

cobalto.name: Cobalt
cobalto.description: Exotic blue metal. Toxic but powerful.

mithril.name: Mithril
mithril.description: Mythical shiny metal. Legendary and nearly impossible to find.

oricalco.name: Orichalcum
oricalco.description: Divine golden alloy. Symbol of supreme power.

titanio.name: Titanium
titanio.description: Extremely resistant metal. Forged by titans.

draconita.name: Dragonite
draconita.description: Mineral extracted from dragons. Latent draconic power.

madera-pino.name: Pine Wood
madera-pino.description: Light wood from conifers. Easy to work, perfect for beginners.

madera-abedul.name: Birch Wood
madera-abedul.description: Bright and flexible wood. Excellent strength-to-weight ratio.

madera-abeto.name: Fir Wood
madera-abeto.description: Fine-grained conifer wood. Versatile and reliable.

madera-nogal.name: Walnut Wood
madera-nogal.description: Dense dark-colored wood. Excellent for refined finishes.

madera-caoba.name: Mahogany Wood
madera-caoba.description: Precious reddish wood. Highly appreciated for its beauty.

madera-ebano.name: Ebony Wood
madera-ebano.description: Rare and hard black wood. Symbol of supreme elegance.

madera-teca.name: Teak Wood
madera-teca.description: Durable tropical wood. Resists the ravages of time perfectly.

madera-maldita.name: Cursed Wood
madera-maldita.description: Wood imbued with ancient curses. Latent dark power.

madera-mistica.name: Mystical Wood
madera-mistica.description: Wood wrapped in arcane mystery. Channels occult energy.

madera-sagrada.name: Sacred Wood
madera-sagrada.description: Blessed wood from ancestral temples. Radiates divine protection.

madera-primordial.name: Primordial Wood
madera-primordial.description: Wood from the first times. Pure essence of the ancient forest.

madera-dimensional.name: Dimensional Wood
madera-dimensional.description: Wood extracted from other dimensions. Defies physical logic.

madera-dragonica.name: Dragon Bone Wood
madera-dragonica.description: Wood extracted from ancient dragon trees. Legendary and epic material.

carbon.name: Coal Ingot
carbon.description: Refined coal ingot. Base for basic metalworking.

hierro.name: Iron Ingot
hierro.description: Resistant iron ingot. Fundamental material for weapons.

plata.name: Silver Ingot
plata.description: Precious silver ingot. Highly valued in jewelry.

tungsteno.name: Tungsten Ingot
tungsteno.description: Ultra-resistant tungsten ingot. For elite weapons.

oro.name: Gold Ingot
oro.description: Precious gold ingot. Symbol of supreme wealth.

platino.name: Platinum Ingot
platino.description: Noble platinum ingot. Supreme kingdom material.

obsidiana.name: Obsidian Ingot
obsidiana.description: Volcanic glass ingot. Sharp and magical.

cobalto.name: Cobalt Ingot
cobalto.description: Exotic bluish ingot. Toxic but powerful.

oricalco.name: Orichalcum Ingot
oricalco.description: Divine golden ingot. Celestial power condensed.

adamantita.name: Adamantite Ingot
adamantita.description: Indestructible ingot. The matter of eternity.

titanio.name: Titanium Ingot
titanio.description: Titan ingot. Strength of the cosmos.

ceniza.name: Ash
ceniza.description: Gray powder resulting from burning wood. Byproduct of woodburning.
